Description.Text:
The Hotel Cala Millor offers you all kinds of activities so as to enjoy an unforgettable holiday with your couple or with friends. If you would like to relax after an intense day, there is nothing better than doing so in the wellness, with sauna, the jacuzzi or enjoying a soothing massage at the hotel itself.
Situated close to the beautiful Cala Millor beach, this 158 bedroomed hotel is designed exclusively for couples, with a laid back, relaxed and pleasant setting.
The hotel offers a personal service and perfect surroundings to enjoy a relaxing holiday, without the noise and stress of everyday life.
Live music, chilled out atmosphere, the same table reservation, romantic moments and everything the hotel can do to ensure the days you spend with here are simply unforgettable.
The Hotel have reception service, lounge, lounge-bar, Wifi area, air-conditioned restaurant, as well as a pleasant poolside bar. You will also enjoy several outdoor swimming pools, a heated indoor swimming pool in the off season (depending on the weather) multi-sports court, tennis court, gymnasium and solarium and air rifle shooting.
Fine cuisine is a key aspect of the hotel offering a wide-range of hot and cold buffet food for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The drinks that appear on the 'All Included Garden' menu are also available between 10:00am and 00:00pm.
The best entertainment activities are run by the prestigious Garden team at the Hotel Cala Millor Garden, which offers an exciting programme of entertainment activities. During your day of leisure there is no end to a multitude of activities (water-aerobics, archery, air pistol and rifle shooting, boules, basketball, tennis and much more). When night falls you will also enjoy fun and intense moments with our varied programmes of live shows, games and disco music

Standard Room - 2 twin (single) beds or 1 double bed - The rooms at the Cala Millor Garden have a bathroom and a terrace or balcony. All of them are equipped with air conditioning, Satelite TV, music, telephone, hairdryer, minibar and a safe (additional charge).
